text: Gumazir avɨrim Pol ko Sailasɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn zuima, Judaba kamaghɨn naviba bar ikufi. Egha puram aruir gumazir kurar maba akumakumigha gumazir bɨzir dafam gami. Egha ghua nguibar ekiamɨn aven arua pamtem atarava araghasi. Me Pol ko Sailas inigh avɨrir torim bagh mangasa, egha me aning buriasa ivemara Jesonɨn dɨpenimɨn aven ghue.
